author: lundblad
msg: Follow-up to r19486.  Fix test failures on Windows.
Ensure that the dumpfile is read in binary mode and compensate for the
fact that run_and_verify_checkout will check the file contents

msg: (svn_test__txn_script_exec): Use svn_boolean_t data type for local

author: djames
msg: (svn_wc_props_modified_p): Cleanup dead code. We only need to check once
whether an entry exists -- not three times! Also, cleanup subpools when no
entry is found, and when propcaching is enabled.

author: djames
msg: (svn_fs_base__dag_commit_txn): Don't check whether 'new_rev' is NULL. We

author: djames
msg: (TextCommitRenderer.render): Show log message before changed paths, instead
